title: How to Pay for an Uber with Cash

steps.title: Open Uber.
steps.content: Open Uber. This app icon looks like a white broken circle on a black background that you'll find on your Home screens, in the app drawer, or by searching.

steps.title: Tap ☰.
steps.content: Tap ☰ . This is in the upper left corner of your screen.

steps.title: Tap Payment.
steps.content: Tap Payment . You'll see this under "Uber Rewards" and "Help." [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap to select CASH.
steps.content: Tap to select CASH . If you don't see this option, you can't pay for your Uber with cash in your area. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Request a ride.
steps.content: Request a ride. You'll need to set a destination and confirm your pickup to request a ride and continue. Make sure you're requesting the right kind of Uber service ; for example, pick UberXL if you have more than 4 passengers.

steps.title: Pay your driver with cash at the end of the ride.
steps.content: Pay your driver with cash at the end of the ride. When the ride is completed, your driver will give you the price for the ride, without including a tip.
